concept.title: MME support for enhancements to QoS values modifications for roamers (Feature f10112-09)
concept.shortdesc: This feature provides the global parameter applyLocallyProvQosValuesForHrt to control whether the MME applies the QCI/ARP/PCI/PVI values from the locally provisioned QoS values for HRT scenarios if the received QCI/ARP/PCI/PVI values are different. By default, this feature is disabled. This feature applies only to the dedicated bearers.
